entity.name: Melania Trump
entity.description: Former US First Lady Melania Trump

text: @FLOTUS The highly touted Fourth of July fireworks stupidity at Mount Rushmore isn't coming cheap -- it will cost the country well over half a million bucks ... and could cause a spike in coronavirus. What a waste of taxpayer money. I couldn't grab the remote fast enough to turn it off.
